QuestData.Title: Basic Climbing Gear
QuestData.Description:
<Pathfinder Jeb motions to the supply kit next to him.>
You're going to need supplies to survive out there.
Let's get you what you need to start climbing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Expedition Supply Kit to research Climbing Gear.
QuestData.RewardText:
This basic equipment will get you started.
Come back when you have more Dragon Isles Supplies to get trained in new gear.
